title: Rain Alarm Pro
summary: Reliably warns you of approaching rain in time.
description: This weather app alerts you when rain is approaching. The alerts are a reliable short-term forecast based on near real-time data. This app is more precise and reliable than a traditional forecast.It is very useful for all outdoor activities – including cycling, motorcycling, hiking, gardening, BBQs, picnics, dog walking and DIY.Features:• Alerts to every type of precipitation, whether rain, snow or hail• Alert as a notification with vibration and/or sound• Simple and easy map overview• Handy widgets in different sizes and themesThe data is collected from governmental weather services. Supported countries:Americas: USA (including Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Guam), Canada, Bermuda, Mexico, El Salvador, ArgentinaEurope: UK, Ireland, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Iceland, Spain (including the Balearic and the Canary Islands), Germany, Austria, Netherlands, Poland, Slovenia, Croatia, Belarus, UkraineAsia: Taiwan, Macau, Hong Kong, Japan, Republic of Korea, Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, BruneiOceania: AustraliaIncludes all extra features:• No more ads• Multiple alarms and additional settings• Animation settings and overlay transparency• Multiple locations and additional settings• More widget color schemes• Activate the Android Wear app (adjustable and zoomable map view with animation)Also available for other platforms: https://app.rain-alarm.comFollow us on Twitter for the latest news: https://twitter.com/rainalarm
descriptionHTML:
This weather app alerts you when rain is approaching. The alerts are a reliable short-term forecast based on near real-time data. This app is more precise and reliable than a traditional forecast.
It is very useful for all outdoor activities – including cycling, motorcycling, hiking, gardening, BBQs, picnics, dog walking and DIY.

Features:
• Alerts to every type of precipitation, whether rain, snow or hail
• Alert as a notification with vibration and/or sound
• Simple and easy map overview
• Handy widgets in different sizes and themes

The data is collected from governmental weather services. Supported countries:
Americas: USA (including Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Guam), Canada, Bermuda, Mexico, El Salvador, Argentina
Europe: UK, Ireland, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Iceland, Spain (including the Balearic and the Canary Islands), Germany, Austria, Netherlands, Poland, Slovenia, Croatia, Belarus, Ukraine
Asia: Taiwan, Macau, Hong Kong, Japan, Republic of Korea, Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei
Oceania: Australia

Includes all extra features:
• No more ads
• Multiple alarms and additional settings
• Animation settings and overlay transparency
• Multiple locations and additional settings
• More widget color schemes
• Activate the Android Wear app (adjustable and zoomable map view with animation)

Also available for other platforms: https://app.rain-alarm.com
Follow us on Twitter for the latest news: https://twitter.com/rainalarm
comments: The Dutch and Belgian radar data is completely blank. I'm in the eastern UK, and so I get very poor use of this app when the weather is coming from the east, with no Dutch /Belgian data!
Umbrella widget is not showing as an option

A superb app with pure genius design. Rain Alarm Pro gives me notification when rain is on the way and I can choose any sound on my 'phone or tablet if I want an audible alarm. Since it runs a visual sequence of the rain progression on my screen, I can estimate the time of the rain's arrival and not only that, I can see very easily if the clouds are growing in size or evaporating. Brilliant, just brilliant. Astonishing support from the developer too!

This app has been working fine after some problems with it a while back but today it hasn't updated the radar image for more than four hours despite the timeline at the bottom of the screen doing so. This is happening with my home wifi, on 4G and on the WiFi at work. Uninstalling and reinstalling it hasn't made any difference. This app remains stubbornly at a three star rating, I'm afraid.

I owe so much to this app for staying dry. Well worth the cost! Of all the apps I have, this is the one that has stayed on my device for a long time. P. S. I have not had any notice of battery consumption using this app.
recentChanges: - New data for Germany, Netherlands, Norway
- Support for Poland, Sweden, Estonia, and Fiji
